be.docarch.odt2braille
Class Settings

java.lang.Object
  be.docarch.odt2braille.Settings

public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object

Collection of all braille-related settings and properties of an OpenOffice.org document.

Author:
Bert Frees

Settings

public Settings(java.io.File flatOdtFile)
         throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                java.io.IOException
Creates a new Settings instance. The Locale for the document is set to the default value.

Parameters:
flatOdtFile - The "flat XML" .odt file. This single file is the concatenation of all XML files in a normal .odt file.
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException
java.io.IOException

Parameters:

odtLocale - The Locale for the document.
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException
java.io.IOException
Method Detail

computeTranslationTable

private java.lang.String computeTranslationTable(java.lang.String language)
Compute the most appropriate translation table for a certain language. First, the list of supported translation tables is scanned for the exact language code. If no match is found, only the first part of the codes (the part before the first "-", or the whole code if it doesn't contain a "-") are considered. The first supported translation table in the list of which the first part matches the first part of the language code is selected.

Parameters:
language - The language code.
Returns:
The code of the most appropriate translation table if one is found, null otherwise.

computeGrade

private int computeGrade(int grade,
                         java.lang.String language)
Compute the grade for a certain language. First, the list of supported grades for this language is scanned for the desired grade. If no match is found, the list is scanned for ever decreasing grades. If still no match is found, the first supported grade of the list is selected.

Parameters:
grade - The desired grade.
language - The language code.
Returns:
The computed grade.

getSupportedTranslationTables

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSupportedTranslationTables()
Get the list of all supported translation tables. (Each supported translation has a code of the form "[a-z]+(-[A-Z]+)*" and for each supported translation table there is at least one entry in supportedTranslationTablesGrades of the form translation table code + "-g[0-9]".)

Returns:
The supported translation table codes.

getSupportedGrades

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getSupportedGrades(java.lang.String language)
Get the list of all supported grades for a certain language. (For each supported grade there is an entry in supportedTranslationTablesGrades that is equal to translation table code for the specified language + "-g" + grade.)

Parameters:
language - The language code
Returns:
The supported grades.

setTranslationTable

public void setTranslationTable(java.lang.String translationTable,
                                java.lang.String language)
Link a translation table to a language if the desired translation table is supported. The grade is set to a default value. If the desired translation table is not supported and the language is not linked to another translation table yet, the most appropriate supported translation table is selected for this language.

Parameters:
translationTable - The desired translation table code.
language - The language code.

setGrade

public void setGrade(int grade,
                     java.lang.String language)
Change the grade for a certain language. If the language doesn't support the desired grade, the current grade is not changed.

Parameters:
grade - The desired grade.
language - The language code.

getTranslationTable

public java.lang.String getTranslationTable(java.lang.String language)
Get the translation table code for a certain language. If the language is not linked to a translation table yet, the most appropriate supported translation table is selected.

Parameters:
language - The language code.
Returns:
The tranlation table code.

getGrade

public int getGrade(java.lang.String language)
Get the grade for a certain language. If the language is not linked to a translation table yet, it is linked to the most appropriate supported translation and the grade is set to a default value.

Parameters:
language - The language code.
Returns:
The grade.

getLanguages

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getLanguages()
Get a list of all languages that are linked to a translation table

Returns:
The language codes.

getMainLanguage

public java.lang.String getMainLanguage()
Returns:
The main language code of the document.

setMarginLeft

public void setMarginLeft(int margin)
Set the left margin to the desired value. If this is not possible, it will be set to the most nearby value. The right margin and number of cells per line are updated accordingly.

Parameters:
margin - The desired value.

setMarginRight

public void setMarginRight(int margin)
Set the right margin to the desired value. If this is not possible, it will be set to the most nearby value. The left margin and number of cells per line are updated accordingly.

Parameters:
margin - The desired value.

setMarginTop

public void setMarginTop(int margin)
Set the top margin to the desired value. If this is not possible, it will be set to the most nearby value. The bottom margin and number of lines per page are updated accordingly.

Parameters:
margin - The desired value.

setMarginBottom

public void setMarginBottom(int margin)
Set the bottom margin to the desired value. If this is not possible, it will be set to the most nearby value. The top margin and number of lines per page are updated accordingly.

Parameters:
margin - The desired value.

setCellsPerLine

public void setCellsPerLine(int cells)
Set the number of cells per line to the desired value. If this is not possible, it will be set to the most nearby value. The left and right margins are updated accordingly.

Parameters:
cells - The desired value.

setLinesPerPage

public void setLinesPerPage(int lines)
Set the number of lines per page to the desired value. If this is not possible, it will be set to the most nearby value. The top and bottom margins are updated accordingly.

Parameters:
lines - The desired value.
